attributes.action: Fix the way Atos is handling PIP claims and wrongly denying benefit
attributes.additional_details:
Some reading material for those of you who'd like to know more about the underhand tactics of Atos and Capita:
http://www.theguardian.com/society/2016/mar/15/disability-cuts-cutbacks-destroy-independent-living-budget

https://johnnyvoid.wordpress.com/2014/02/11/half-of-claims-for-new-disability-benefit-rejected/

http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/channel-4-dispatches-benefits-row-pips_uk_570c9b0fe4b0ae22c1e0397f
attributes.background:
PIP is a benefit replacing DLA for disabled/ill people. 
There is a backlog of people waiting for a decision & many people being turned down unfairly. 
Atos employees lie about evidence they are presented with at interviews/discount the extent of a persons' illness/disability, to deny them PIP.
